description: A guide to some easy hikes around the Halton, Hamilton and Niagara area for new to experienced hikers. It includes a variety of 24 hikes for every level, that shows you local highlights with clear instructions to get you there with stoke to spare. The hikes use the Bruce Trail, conservation lands and 'secret' local trails that are blessed with a plethora of waterfalls, cliffs, land features, and trails that feature historic ruins. Wildlife, caves and panoramic views of the Niagara Escarpment and Lake Ontario will also fill in your views of wonderment. With concise instructions in an easy-to-read format, anyone visiting from another city, province or country can enjoy everything the area has to offer.
name: Escarpment Trails and Treks
